definition: peacock feathers on an official's hat displaying his rank (traditional)/pheasant tail feathers on warriors' helmets (opera)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
artificial beard worn by Chinese opera actors
decorated hat or helmet in Chinese opera to characterize role
dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)
official robe worn by ministers during the Ming 明 (1368-1644) and Qing 清 (1644-1911) dynasties
female military role in a Chinese opera
male military role in a Chinese opera
